Class PrefMouseListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • alotoc.logic.PrefMouseListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class PrefMouseListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener
    This is a MouseListener specifically for the preferences dialog.

    Kazeheki

      • isInside

        private boolean isInside(java.awt.Point clickedAt,
                         int x,
                         int y,
                         int ex,
                         int ey)
        Check whether the given Point (where it was clicked) is inside the given bounds.
        Parameters:
        clickedAt - The Point where in the frame was clicked.
        x - X position of left upper corner.
        y - Y position of left upper corner.
        ex - X position of right lower corner.
        ey - Y position of right lower corner.
        Returns:
        Whether the given Point is inside the given bounds.
